CustomField.formula: IF( Bloods_in_Sydney__c = TRUE, "**URGENT** Specimens to be placed in red urgent specimen bags with request form. These are to be placed in urgent IVF purple courier satchel with IVF Courier Cover Sheet. Raise a Click-To-Collect Courier request stating: Contracted Urgent IVF sample.", IF( Urgent__c = TRUE, "URGENT", '' ) )
CustomField.label: Urgent as Text
